properties.Name: BP PRODUCTS NORTH AMERICA INC, WHITING
properties.Image: photo Claire Pentecost (click for enlargement)
properties.website: Crude capacity 410,000 bpd. Website here. EPA facility report here.
properties.Notes: The BP Whiting refinery is among the world's largest processers of tar sands oil from Canada, which is brought to East Chicago by Enbridge company pipelines. Tar sands oil is full of a highly polluting coal-like substance called petroleum coke. Through the dusty piles of petcoke stocked along the Calumet river, we inhabitants of Chicagoland have come to perceive our own place in the global climate-change production system.
